Container.Name: antennas
Container.Overview: HDHomeRun emulator for Plex/Jellyfin/Emby DVR to connect to Tvheadend. [br][br] To run this container, [b]first create a config.yaml on the config folder[/b] with the following lines (changing to the IPs, ports and tuner count of your system): [br][br] tvheadend_url: http://user:pas@X.X.X.X:9981[br] antennas_url: http://X.X.X.X:5004[br] tuner_count: 4[br][br]
Container.Description:
HDHomeRun emulator for Plex/Jellyfin/Emby DVR to connect to Tvheadend.
To run this container, first create a config.yaml on the config folder with the following lines (changing to the IPs, ports and tuner count of your system):
tvheadend_url: http://user:pas@X.X.X.X:9981 antennas_url: http://X.X.X.X:5004 tuner_count: 4
